metadata.title: CVE-2020-9543 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: OpenStack Manila <7.4.1, >=8.0.0 <8.1.1, and >=9.0.0 <9.1.1 allowsattackers to view, update, delete, or share resources that do not belong tothem, because of a context-free lookup of a UUID. Attackers may also createresources, such as shared file systems and groups of shares on such sharenetworks.

criterions.comment: manila: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
